document_data.mainbody:
Shatterstone was the divine realm of Vaprak, a patron of ogres and trolls in the Giant pantheon, prior to the Spellplague.
In the Great Wheel cosmology, this realm was located in Abyss, While in the World Tree cosmology, Shatterstone was situated in Jotunheim alongside the divine realms of the other members of the Giant pantheon.
In the World Tree cosmology, Shatterstone was said to be a pitiful cave at the base of a great cliff.
This divine realm was primarily inhabited by Vapraks petitioners. They were greatly despised by all the other giant inhabitants of Jotunheim and hid from them at all cost.
